page.title: 11A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: Auntie Dosh and Uncle Joe arrived with their dog called Bruce. It was very big but it was only a puppy. We were all excited. Bruce wanted to play with our dog but our dog was too scared. Soon Auntie Dosh went in to help with the meal. Auntie Dosh had brought some cakes, bread, eggs, cheese, squash, coffee and lots of other things for us. Debbie and I did the tables and we had our meal. After our meal we had to tidy up our bedroom because mum said that they could stay for a night or two. That evening we were very busy making beds for them all. When the beds were made we each in turn got washed. It took us a very long time to fall asleep because we were all very excited.
